price: 52. Mpe bakoloba ete: Tondimi naye, kasi ndenge nini bakozela bondimi na mosika?
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلتَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqālū āmannā bihi wa-annā lahumu al-tanāwushu min makānin baʿīdin
